job_history.work_description: Provided full range of generalist services, employee retention, employee engagement, performance management and corporate social responsibility including talent acquisition in the geography within the HR operational framework of the organization.
Responsible for delivering the end to end Recruitment and Generalist services to the North Zone.
Responsible for overseeing all activities in regards to opening new corporate accounts.

skills.name: Human Resources
skills.explanation: Held multiple HR roles with increasing responsibilities, including Regional HR Deputy Manager, and has an MBA in Human Resources, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Recruitment
skills.explanation: Delivered end-to-end recruitment services and was responsible for talent acquisition, showing strong proficiency in recruitment.

skills.name: Employee Engagement
skills.explanation: Provided employee engagement services as part of generalist HR services, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Performance Management
skills.explanation: Handled performance management as part of generalist HR services, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Employee Retention
skills.explanation: Provided employee retention services as part of generalist HR services, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held managerial roles in HR, including Regional HR Deputy Manager, showing a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Operations Management
skills.explanation: Overseen activities related to opening new corporate accounts as a Branch Operations Officer, indicating some practical experience in operations management.
